RMC.ACOtherModHint: Modifier to AC that is not from equipment or ability that should be included in the auto calculation
RMC.ActionDiceInvalid: Character Action Dice doesn't contain a valid expression, defaulting to 1d20
RMC.ActionDiceSheetHint: Enter your primary action die here, set up multiple action dice in the </>Config menu in the title bar
RMC.ActorImportConfirmationMessage: This will import {number} actors. Are you sure you want to continue?
RMC.ActorImportPCHint:
For Zero-level PCs, you can use Purple Sorcerer to customize your party generation, just make sure you use Style/Format of 'Plain Text' at the bottom.

For Upper-level PCs, also make sure you use Style of 'Upper Level Text' at the bottom.
RMC.ActorImportNPCHint:
For NPC statlines, ensure you have the trailing period at the end, and you remove any non-standard stuff like armor.

Note: Crit Die and Table for NPCs is a best-guess calculation, you should double-check it after import.
RMC.AddClassLevelToInitiativeConfigHint: Add Class Level to Initiative (e.g. for Warriors)
RMC.AlreadyHasInitiative: Token already has initiative score in the Combat Tracker; not re-rolling
RMC.AsCoinsHint: Delete this item and move its value to your Funds
RMC.ActionDiceHint: Comma-separated list of character's Action Dice, e.g. 1d20,1d16
RMC.AttackBonusConfigModeHint: Warriors/Dwarves should use 'Roll Per Attack' to roll their deed; all others should use flat
RMC.AttackRollEmote: {actorName} {actionName} with their {weaponName} and hits AC {rollHTML}{deedRollHTML} for {damageRollHTML} points of damage!{crit}{fumble}
RMC.BadValueFormulaWarning: Bad formula in item value field!
RMC.CharacterTabHint: Ability scores, saves, name, level, xp
RMC.CheckPenaltyConfigHint: Check Penalty computed from armor if Compute (above) is checked; otherwise manually-entered value
RMC.ChooseAClass: You must use the Sheet option in the title bar to choose a class before you can change level.
RMC.ClericTabHint: Lay on hands, turn undead, divine aid, configure spell check
RMC.ComputeACConfigHint: Compute the Armor Class automatically from the Base AC Ability mod (set below) and equipped armor
RMC.ComputeCheckPenaltyConfigHint: Compute Check Penalty based on equipped armor and apply it to checks
RMC.ComputeInitiativeConfigHint: Compute Initiative based on Agility modifier and Warrior Level
RMC.ComputeMeleeAndMissileAttackAndDamageHin: Automatically Compute the Melee and Missile Attack and Damage Boxes on the Character tab
RMC.ComputeSavingThrowsHint: Compute Saving Throws automatically - you can add adjustments to the calculation by clicking on a Saving Throw value
RMC.ComputeSpeedConfigHint: Compute Speed from Base Speed (below) and subtracting armor speed penalties
RMC.ConfigureHint: Use </>Config Menu in title bar to disable auto-calc
RMC.ConfigureSheetHint: Configure RMC-specific options for this character
RMC.DeleteItem: Delete this item from the sheet?
RMC.DeleteItemExplain: This will remove the item and cannot be undone
RMC.DisapprovalRangeHint: Current disapproval range - increase as your cleric gains disapproval, decrease as you lose it
RMC.DisapprovalTableHint: Table to use for disapproval results - only change if you build a custom table for your deity
RMC.DisplayValueHint: Display-only - use fields below and on the character tab to change this calculated value
RMC.DivineAidHint: Click to roll a Divine Aid check, CMD/CTRL for more options
RMC.ElfImmunities: Immune to magical sleep and paralysis
RMC.ElfLuckMod: Luck modifier to one level 1 spell
RMC.ElfTabHint: Detect secret doors, familiar, patron, corruptions
RMC.FleetingLuckClearButtonTitle: Take all Fleeting Luck from all users
RMC.FleetingLuckClearTitle: Take all Fleeting Luck from this user
RMC.FleetingLuckGiveTitle: Award a point of Fleeting Luck to this user
RMC.FleetingLuckResetButtonTitle: Reset Fleeting Luck for a new session
RMC.FleetingLuckResetMessage: Fleeting Luck reset for all users
RMC.FleetingLuckSpendTitle: Spend Fleeing Luck for this user
RMC.FleetingLuckSpendNoLuckWarning: {user} has no Fleeting Luck to spend
RMC.FleetingLuckTakeTitle: Take a point of Fleeting Luck from this user
RMC.HitDieHint: Enter the hit die you roll each level, like 1d6
RMC.InitSheetHint: Initiative is auto-calculated, use </>Config Menu in title bar to change
RMC.InheritTooltip: Inherited from Actor. See Item Config
RMC.InitiativeOtherModHint: Modifier to Initiative that is not from ability or level that should be included in the auto calculation
RMC.LayOnHandsHint: Click to roll a Lay on Hands check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.LevelDataNotFound: Level Data not found - is the RMC Core Book module installed?
RMC.LevelIncreasePrompt: Do you want to increase or decrease your level?
RMC.LuckyBonusHint: Bonus to hit from a Warrior or Dwarf's lucky weapon
RMC.LuckyWeaponHint: Lucky Weapon this warrior chose at level 1 - reminder only
RMC.LuckyWeaponModHint: Character's luck modifier at level 1 - reminder only
RMC.MacroNoTokenSelected: You must select a token to run this macro
RMC.ManifestationRerollExplain: Discard previous Manifestation result and re-roll or look up based on entered number?
RMC.ManifestationTabHint: Roll and configure manifestation for this spell
RMC.MeleeAttackHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus + Strength Bonus
RMC.MeleeDamageHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus (deed die) for Warriors and Dwarves + Strength Bonus, or just Strength Bonus for others
RMC.MeleeMissileBonusConfigHint: These fields adjust the auto-calculated values
RMC.MercurialMagicRerollExplain: Discard previous Mercurial Magic result and re-roll or look up based on entered number?
RMC.MercurialMagicRerollPrompt: Re-roll or Lookup Mercurial Magic Roll?
RMC.MercurialTabHint: Roll and configure mercurial magic for this spell
RMC.MigrationComplete: Finished migration to RMC System version {systemVersion}!
RMC.MigrationInfo: Beginning RMC System Migration to version {systemVersion}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server
RMC.MissileAttackHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus + Agility Bonus
RMC.MissileDamageHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus (deed die) for Warriors and Dwarves only
RMC.Name: Name
RMC.NoModifiableTerms: No modifiable terms found in roll formula
RMC.NoSpellResultsTableWarning: Spell Results Table not defined for this spell
RMC.OverrideHint: Override the value entirely, disabling auto-calculation
RMC.ParsePlayerWarning: Failed to read player characters (expecting Purple Sorcerer Plain Text or JSON)
RMC.ParseSingleNPCWarning: Failed to read one or more NPC/monster (expecting one or more RMC statblocks)
RMC.ParseSinglePlayerWarning: Failed to read one or more player characters from Purple Sorcerer Plain Text
RMC.PasteBlock: Paste In A Stat Block to Import
RMC.PartyDeleteExplain: This will remove the actor from the party.
RMC.PartyEmpty: Drag and drop an actor here
RMC.RemoveEmptyItemsConfigHint: Remove items from character sheet once they have zero quantity
RMC.ResolveValueEmote:
Rolled value of {itemName}:
{pp} Pp. {ep} Ep. {gp} Gp. {sp} Sp. {cp} Cp.
RMC.RollAgilityCheckHint: Click to roll an Agility check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollIntelligenceCheckHint: Click to roll an Intelligence check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollLuckCheckHint: Click to roll a Luck check (roll under Luck score) - Click 'Modifier' to roll adding modifier instead, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollLuckCheckModHint: Click to roll a Luck check adding Luck modifier, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollPersonalityCheckHint: Click to roll a Personality check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollSavingThrowHint: Click to roll this save, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollSkillCheckHint: Click to roll this skill, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollSpellCheckHint: Click to roll a Spell Check, CMD/CTRL click for more options - the roll button on spells on the spells tab is a better option in most cases
RMC.RollStaminaCheckHint: Click to roll an Stamina check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollStrengthCheckHint: Click to roll a Strength check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.RollWisdomCheckHint: Click to roll a Wisdom check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.SavingThrowAdjustmentsConfigHint: Adjust saving throws for this character
RMC.SavingThrowOtherBonusHint: Other consistent bonus to this save (e.g. from Lucky roll)
RMC.SavingThrowOverrideHint: Override the auto-calculation with this value, ignoring all other values
RMC.SettingAutomateClericDisapprovalHint: Automatically apply disapproval range increases and roll disapproval results for Clerics. Applies to the Cleric's spell-like abilities and to spells with Casting Mode set to 'Cleric'
RMC.SettingAutomateDamageFumblesCritsHint: Automatically roll damage, critical hits, and fumbles when attacks are rolled
RMC.SettingAutomateFleetingLuckHint: Automatically track Fleeting Luck based on roll results
RMC.SettingAutomateWizardSpellLossHint: Automatically mark spells as lost when a casting fails. Applies to the Wizard/Elf Spell Check button and spells with Casting Mode set to 'Wizard'
RMC.SettingCriticalHitsCompendiumHint: Compendium to look in for critical hit tables - table name must start with Crit Table XXX (where XXX is the actor's crit table)
RMC.SettingDeleteItemHint: Ask for confirmation before deleting equipment, spells, or custom skills from character sheets
RMC.SettingDisapprovalTablesCompendiumHint: Compendium to look in for critical hit tables. The specific table to use is selectable from the Cleric sheet
RMC.SettingDivineAidTableHint: Roll Table to use for Divine Aid - must be in a compendium pack
RMC.SettingEmoteRollsHint: Convert roll chat cards to narrative emotes.
RMC.SettingEnableFleetingLuckHint: Enable Fleeting Luck user interface elements
RMC.SettingFumbleTableHint: Roll Table to use for fumbles - must be in a compendium pack
RMC.SettingLayOnHandsTableHint: Roll Table to use for Lay On Hands - must be in a compendium pack
RMC.SettingManualCompendiumConfigurationHint: If you want to build your own lookup compendia instead of using the Core Book Module - not recommended
RMC.SettingMercurialMagicTableHint: Roll Table to use for Mercurial Magic effects - must be in a compendium pack
RMC.SettingShowRollModifierByDefault: Show the Modify Roll dialog by default
RMC.SettingShowRollModifierByDefaultHint: Show Roll Modifier dialog without having to CMD/CTRL click on character sheet items
RMC.SettingTurnUnholyTableHint: Roll Table to use for Turn Unholy - must be in a compendium pack
RMC.SettingWeaponEquipmentCheckHint: If weapon is used but not equipped, prevent the roll and show a warning

Settings.ShowWelcomeDialogHint: Show the welcome dialog on module startup

RMC.ShieldBashHint: Die size to use for shield bash attacks; set up a shield bash weapon in the equipment tab and use this as the action die override.
RMC.ShowBackstabConfigHint: Show Backstab attack option in Equipment tab for weapons (e.g. for Thieves)
RMC.ShowMercurialTabInfo: Show the Mercurial Effect tab of the item sheet regardless of casting mode
RMC.ShowSkillsConfigHint: Show Custom Skills Tab (e.g. to add clickable custom skills for custom classes)
RMC.ShowSpellsConfigHint: Show Custom Spells Tab (e.g. to add spells for classes that normally don't have spells)
RMC.ShowSwimFlySpeedConfigHint: Show Swim and Fly speed boxes on character sheet
RMC.SheetHint: Click to choose a sheet, which sets your character class
RMC.SkillApplyCheckPenaltyHint: Apply Check Penalty from armor to this skill
RMC.SkillDieHint: Inherited from actor, use </> Config in title bar to change this
RMC.SkillUseLevelHint: Adds character level to the skill check, useful for third-party skills that scale with level
RMC.SkillUseAbilityHint: Use </> Config in title bar to enable this
RMC.SortInventoryConfigHint: Sort items by equipment tab within their sections
RMC.SpellCastingAttributeHint: Attribute modifier from your primary spell casting attribute
RMC.SpellCastingModeInfo: Select between Wizard, Cleric, and Generic casting rules
RMC.SpellCheckNoOwnedItemWarning: Cannot roll a spell check with a spell you don't own
RMC.SpellCheckNonSpellWarning: Cannot roll a spell check with a non-spell item
RMC.SpellCheckOtherModHint: Modifier to Spell Checks that is not from ability or level that should be included in the auto calculation
RMC.SpellLostWarning: Cannot cast '{spell}' again in this day!
RMC.SpellTabHint: Level, range, and other basic spell data
RMC.SettingSpellSideEffectsCompendiumHint: The Spell Side Effects Compendium holds the tables for spell manifestations and corruptions
RMC.SettingStrictCriticalHitsHint: When enabled, critical hit ranges scale proportionally with die size changes. For example, if you normally crit on 20 and roll a d24, you only crit on 24. If you normally crit on 18-20 and roll a d24, you crit on 22-24.
RMC.SpellSideEffectsCompendiumNotFoundWarnin: The 'Spell Side Effects Compendium' was not found, you will either need to make one or activate the Core Book Module
RMC.SpellTabHelp: Drag in a Spell Item from the Items Compendium or click "+Add" in the upper right
RMC.ThiefBackstabSkillHint: There is a backstab button on each weapon on the equipment that that can be used to roll a backstab
RMC.ThiefSkillHint: Click to roll this skill, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.ThiefTabHint: Find traps, climb walls, sneak silently, etc.
RMC.Title: Title
RMC.TokenHint: Configure the default token for your character, which is used when you drag them onto the map
RMC.TurnUnholyHint: Click to roll a Turn Unholy check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
RMC.UndergroundSkills: Underground Skills: smell gold/gems, find construction
RMC.WeaponDamageBonusHint: Bonus to damage with this weapon for all attacks
RMC.WeaponDamageHint: Base Weapon Damage without bonuses (include those in Weapon Bonus below)
RMC.WeaponNotFound: Unable to find a weapon with id '{id}'
RMC.WeaponPropertiesBackstabDamageHint: Additional Damage bonus only when this weapon is used for a Backstab
RMC.WeaponPropertiesRangeTooltip: Not applicable for a melee weapon
